name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-multiparam-ts
title: Using multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeScript
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeScript and Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot using TypeScript and Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code. It demonstrates how developers can use multi parameters in Microsoft 365 Copilot to support complex utterances and deep retrieval.

thumbnails.alt: Plugin response from Copilot with reference preview Adaptive Card displayed

references.description: Learn more about how to extend Microsoft 365 Copilot
